ch.blinkenlights.android.vanilla

Class FileSystemAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • ch.blinkenlights.android.vanilla.FileSystemAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, LibraryAdapter

    public class FileSystemAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
implements LibraryAdapter
    A list adapter that provides a view of the filesystem. The active directory is set through a Limiter and rows are displayed using MediaViews.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface ch.blinkenlights.android.vanilla.LibraryAdapter

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileSystemAdapter

        public FileSystemAdapter(LibraryActivity activity,
                         Limiter limiter)
        Create a FileSystemAdapter.
        Parameters:
        activity - The LibraryActivity that will contain this adapter. Called on to requery this adapter when the contents of the directory change.
        limiter - An initial limiter to set. If none is given, will be set to the external storage directory.

        Description copied from interface: LibraryAdapter
        Retrieve the data for this adapter. The data must be set with LibraryAdapter.commitQuery(Object) before it takes effect. This should be called on a worker thread.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        The data. Contents depend on the sub-class.

      • setFilter

        public void setFilter(java.lang.String filter)
        Description copied from interface: LibraryAdapter
        Set a new filter. The data should be requeried after calling this.
        Specified by:
        setFilter in interface LibraryAdapter
        Parameters:
        filter - The terms to filter on, separated by spaces. Only media that contain all of the terms (in any order) will be displayed after filtering is complete.

      • setLimiter

        public void setLimiter(Limiter limiter)
        Description copied from interface: LibraryAdapter
        Set the limiter for the adapter. A limiter is intended to restrict displayed media to only those that are children of a given parent media item.
        Specified by:
        setLimiter in interface LibraryAdapter
        Parameters:
        limiter - The limiter, created by LibraryAdapter.buildLimiter(long).

      • getLimiter

        public Limiter getLimiter()
        Description copied from interface: LibraryAdapter

        Specified by:
        getLimiter in interface LibraryAdapter

      • buildLimiter

        public static Limiter buildLimiter(java.io.File file)
        Builds a limiter from the given folder. Only files contained in the given folder will be shown if the limiter is set on this adapter.
        Parameters:
        file - A File pointing to a folder.
        Returns:
        A limiter describing the given folder.

        Parameters:

        See Also:
